subject: Order Confirmation
description_text:
Hello,
I ordered new pedal last night and just wanted to ensure that the order was received, could I also get an estimated time of delivery please?

Many thanks,
Adam Cowan

conversations.body_text: Hi DaCowman47,  Could you please provide your order number? I’ll check which product you purchased — we usually arrange shipment promptly after the order is placed.

Hello,
Please see below the order number,

 #SSN1820

Thanks,
Adam 

>
Hi DaCowman47,    Your package has been shipped, we have sent you a logistic notification, there will be some delay in the update and it is expected to arrive for you on the 2nd.

Hello,
My shipment still says it’s awaiting customs clearance on the tracking, can you please inform if this information is true? I got premium shipping and it’s taking very long now.

Thanks,
Adam

>

Hi DaCowman47,     We are sorry to inform you that your package has been returned due to overweight, we will arrange a UPS courier for you immediately, and it is expected to be delivered to you around the 4th. Sincerely apologize!
